column3: language model can be considered as an important and effective method for semantic error correction. Many existing systems use one language model. In this paper
column5: multiple language models (LMs) are applied into decoding. One LM is used for selecting appropriate answers and others
column7: for further decision. Experiment on a general location-based dataset show the effectiveness of our method.
